    • Method Detail

      • start

        public Context start(String methodName,
                     Context context)
        Description copied from interface: Tracer
        Creates a new tracing span. The context will be checked for containing information about a parent span. If a parent span is found the new span will be added as a child, otherwise the span will be created and added to the context and any downstream start calls will use the created span as the parent.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Tracer
        Parameters:
        methodName - Name of the method triggering the span creation.
        context - Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.
        Returns:
        An updated context object.

      • start

        public Context start(String spanName,
                     Context context,
                     com.azure.core.implementation.tracing.ProcessKind processKind)
        Description copied from interface: Tracer
        Creates a new tracing span. The context will be checked for containing information about a parent span. If a parent span is found the new span will be added as a child, otherwise the span will be created and added to the context and any downstream start calls will use the created span as the parent.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Tracer
        Parameters:
        spanName - Name of the method triggering the span creation.
        context - Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.
        processKind - AMQP message process kind.
        Returns:
        An updated context object.

      • end

        public void end(int responseCode,
                Throwable throwable,
                Context context)
        Description copied from interface: Tracer
        Completes the current tracing span.
        Specified by:
        end in interface Tracer
        Parameters:
        responseCode - Response status code if the span is in a HTTP call context.
        throwable - Potential throwable that happened during the span.
        context - Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.

      • setAttribute

        public void setAttribute(String key,
                         String value,
                         Context context)
        Description copied from interface: Tracer
        Adds metadata to the current span. The context is checked for having span information, if no span information is found in the context no metadata is added.
        Specified by:
        setAttribute in interface Tracer
        Parameters:
        key - Name of the metadata.
        value - Value of the metadata.
        context - Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        context - Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.

        An updated context object.

                Context context)
        Description copied from interface: Tracer
        Completes the current tracing span.
        Specified by:
        end in interface Tracer
        Parameters:

        throwable - Potential throwable that happened during the span.
        context - Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.

      • addLink

        public void addLink(Context eventContext)
        Description copied from interface: Tracer
        Adds a link to the tracing span. Used in batching operations to relate multiple requests under a single batch.
        Specified by:
        addLink in interface Tracer
        Parameters:
        eventContext - Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.

      • extractContext

        public Context extractContext(String diagnosticId,
                              Context context)
        Description copied from interface: Tracer
        Extracts the span's Context from the given event's diagnostic id.
        Specified by:
        extractContext in interface Tracer
        Parameters:
        diagnosticId - Unique identifier for the trace information of the span.
        context - Additional metadata that is passed through the call stack.
        Returns:
        An updated context object.
